location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Shatt Al Arab Outer Bar to Fao’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in black and white on paper, with additions in coloured pen and paintDimensions: 640 x 1011mm, on sheet 670 x 970mm

mods.abstract: The chart shows the outer bar of the Shatt Al Arab to Fao on the Persian Gulf. The state of the Low Water Line ‘at various recent dates from reliable surveys’ are indicated by the following coloured lines: red, 1929; green, 1925; yellow, 1918-19; and blue, 1917. Depths in feet indicated with soundings, and the chart includes brief descriptions of topography.Scale not given.
